title: How Is Glass Made?
description:
How is glass made? Why does glass break? Why do bubbles pop? What's it like inside a bubble? We make everything clear in this episode! Our questions are from kids in Arizona, Brazil, California and Cambodia.

Transcript
itunes:subtitle: How is glass made? Why does glass break? Why do bubbles pop? What's it like inside a bubble? We make everything clear in this episode!
author: questions@butwhykids.org (Vermont Public)
